headline: Roblox, Shake Shack, Keurig Dr Pepper: Market Minute
summary: Julie Hyman discusses the top stories of Tuesday afternoon, including Roblox's (RBLX) new video advertising format, Shake Shack's (SHAK) stock upgrade from Loop Capital, and Keurig Dr Pepper's (KDP) credit agreement and rating upgrade. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Keurig Dr Pepper Gets New $4 Billion Revolving Credit Line
summary: Keurig Dr Pepper shares rose Tuesday after the soft drink and coffee company revealed in a regulatory filing that it has secured a new $4 billion revolving credit agreement.

headline: Unpacking Q4 Earnings: Molson Coors (NYSE:TAP) In The Context Of Other Beverages, Alcohol, and Tobacco Stocks
summary: Looking back on beverages, alcohol, and tobacco stocks’ Q4 earnings, we examine this quarter’s best and worst performers, including Molson Coors (NYSE:TAP) and its peers.
